fields.name: AutoSync
fields.description: The auto sync of the source control. Default is false.

fields.name: Branch
fields.description: The repo branch of the source control.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The user description of the source control.

fields.name: FolderPath
fields.description: The folder path of the source control. Path must be relative.

fields.name: PublishRunbook
fields.description: The auto publish of the source control. Default is true.

fields.name: SecurityToken
fields.description: The authorization token for the repo of the source control.
